title: I need a refund please
body: my friend told me that his account got hacked so i clicked the Purchase RP to go to the paypal page and unlink it from my account temporarily/check to see if the information automatically went thru. however when i clicked the $5 rp on paypal, i thought the next window would take me to the paypal page, but instead completed the purchase. i did not mean to purchase the rp, would it be possible to get a refund plx

replies.body:
Ooof, that sucks! We may be able to help you sort this out if you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our billing specialists will be able to take a look at what happened and see what we can do.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you. i just sent in a ticket
